content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Collection at Position (41.0, -82.0)
- Consists of a burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0) and a wooden chest at position (41.5, -80.5) to collect mined coal.

### Iron Plate Production Facility
- Consists of the following entities:
  - Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
  - Stone furnace at position (10.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
  - Stone furnace at position (13.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
  - Stone furnace at position (16.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
  - Wooden chests at positions (8.5, -0.5), (17.5, -0.5), (19.5, -0.5), (20.5, -0.5), (8.5, 1.5), (17.5, 1.5), and (19.5, 1.5) for storage.
  - Burner inserters at positions (8.5, 0.5), (17.5, 0.5), (19.5, 0.5), and (20.5, 0.5) waiting for source items.

### Electricity Generation System
- Consists of the following entities:
  - Steam engine at position (-0.5, 17.5).
  - Boiler at position (-3.5, 22.0) currently out of fuel.
  - Offshore pump at position (-7.5, 25.5).
  - Pipe network connecting these components.

### Research Lab
- Lab with input of automation science packs but no research in progress.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without available inventory
- Ensure you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors due to full storage
- Regularly check and empty chests or other storage entities to prevent them from becoming full and halting production processes.
